description: Gmail: webhook processes a new inbound email and creates 1 ticket + 1 initial comment
Microsoft: webhook processes a new inbound email and creates 1 ticket + 1 initial comment
Reply threading: reply token resolves ticket and creates exactly 1 new comment
Reply threading: In-Reply-To/References resolves ticket and creates exactly 1 new comment
Body parsing: sanitizer returns non-empty text for plain-text emails
Body parsing: sanitizer returns HTML-derived content when HTML is present
Contact match: sender email matches existing contact and ticket uses contact's client_id/contact_id
Unmatched sender: system follows the defined PRD behavior (defaults/triage/task) without throwing
Missing defaults: inbound processing logs and returns without creating ticket/comment
Attachments: attachment failure does not prevent ticket creation
Attachments: attachment failure does not prevent reply comment creation
Idempotency: replay same reply email does not create duplicate comments
Idempotency: replay same new-email does not create duplicate tickets
Feature flag: toggling flag keeps old behavior when disabled and new in-app behavior when enabled
Worker: workflow-worker runs with `WORKFLOW_WORKER_MODE=v2` and inbound email still works
